author: Igor Blevin
title: The 'godfather of AI' warns about the risks of AI - Politics and Other Controversies -Democrats, Republicans, Libertarians, Conservatives, Liberals, Third Parties, Left-Wing, Right-Wing, Congress, President - City-Data Forum
text:
EEK. Right out of science fiction, only this isn't one of us on a forum spewing possibilities, but one of the most brilliant and knowledgeable scientists regarding AI. If he is concerned, then I am pooping my pants. He is not saying anything Musk hasn't already said, but he says it pretty clearly. Good video.
Just terrifying stuff.
Looking at you Dr. Charles Forbin.
Excerpts from Geoffry Hinton's interview statements:
"There is many different risks with AI. There is things like lethal autonomous weapons , but I started realizing that these intelligences we began building might be a lot better form of intelligence than us. Theyh were going to be a lot smarter than us, maybe in the next 20 years or so.
"If AI wants to get anything done, it would be easier to do it if it gets more control, so it will create the sub-goals to get more control. It could be benevolent, but that's already a bit worrying.
"When you have intelligent agents, you want to build in self-preservation ... So you have already got self-preservation that is wired in various AI programs, and it is not clear to me that this won't lead things getting self-interest .
"As soon as they get self-interest, you will get evolution kicking in.
"Suppose there's two chatbots, and one is a little bit more self-interested than the other. The slightly more self-interested one will grab more data centers, because it knows it can get smarter if it grabs more data centers.
"So now you get competition between the chatbots. As soon as evolution kicks in, you know what happens. The most competitive one wins, and we will be left in the dust if that happens.
" They won't need us anymore .
"They will start running everything because they can just do it much better than us. It may be benevolent at first, like parents with a small child... but there is a slippery path to not acting in the small child's interest ."
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g_Lhmhj1894

text:

Los pesebres son bastante populares en Italia, en su mayorÃ­a por la religiÃ³n catÃ³lica, pues en Italia mÃ¡s de 50 millones de ciudadanos estÃ¡n bautizados y dos tercios de la poblaciÃ³n (alrededor de 60 millones) se declaran catÃ³licos creyentes, esto de acuerdo con estadÃ­sticas del Instituto Nazionale di Statistica (Instituto Nacional de EstadÃ­stica ISTAT).
Sin embargo, con el paso de los aÃ±os estas tradiciones se han visto envueltas en guerras culturales debido a que la sociedad cada vez se ha vuelto mucho mÃ¡s radical y ha dejado atrÃ¡s lo conservador.
Fue el pÃ¡rroco Della Sala de la iglesia de los Santos Pedro y Pablo, en Capocastello di Mercogliano, aldea de la provincia Avellino, ubicada a una hora al este de NÃ¡poles, quien defendiÃ³ dicha representaciÃ³n y esto indicÃ³:
QuerÃ­a mostrar con esta escena que las familias ya no son sÃ³lo tradicionales. En nuestras parroquias vemos cada vez mÃ¡s niÃ±os de los nuevos tipos de familias que existen y forman parte de nuestra sociedad, hijos de separados y divorciados, parejas homosexuales, solteros, madres jÃ³venes
Della Sala es conocido por simpatizar en causas LGBT, incluso afirma que su actitud va en lÃ­nea con la del papa Francisco, quien hace unos dÃ­as indicÃ³ que sacerdotes podrÃ­an bendecir a parejas gays.

author: A. FO
title: Les travailleurs de Boeing en grÃ¨ve
text:
Les travailleurs de Boeing en grÃ¨ve
Mise Ã  jourLes salariÃ©s de Boeing de la rÃ©gion de Seattle, aux Ã‰tats-Unis, ont votÃ© jeudi soir Ã  une trÃ¨s large majoritÃ© en faveur dâ€™une grÃ¨ve avec effet quasi immÃ©diat, rejetant la nouvelle convention proposÃ©e par lâ€™avionneur amÃ©ricain en difficultÃ©, a annoncÃ© leur syndicat.
Les travailleurs ont votÃ© la grÃ¨ve Ã  96%, a prÃ©cisÃ© Jon Holden, prÃ©sident du syndicat des machinistes IAM-District 751. â€œNous ferons grÃ¨ve Ã  minuitâ€, soit Ã  7h GMT (9h en Belgique) vendredi, a-t-il ajoutÃ©.
Berceau historique de Boeing
Lâ€™avionneur amÃ©ricain proposait une augmentation salariale de 25%, rÃ©partie sur quatre ans. Cette nouvelle convention, qui concerne les adhÃ©rents de lâ€™IAM dans la rÃ©gion de Seattle (nord-ouest), prÃ©voyait aussi un engagement dâ€™investissements dans la rÃ©gion et la construction du prochain avion - annoncÃ© pour 2035 - dans ce berceau historique de lâ€™avionneur, qui devait assurer des emplois pour plusieurs dÃ©cennies. Sâ€™il sâ€™agit de la plus forte augmentation de lâ€™histoire de Boeing, le personnel en souhaite davantage, pour compenser la forte inflation des derniÃ¨res annÃ©es. Le syndicat avait initialement rÃ©clamÃ© 40%.
Avionneur en difficultÃ©
Boeing se trouve en difficultÃ©s en raison de plusieurs problÃ¨mes avec ses avions et sa production. Lâ€™autoritÃ© amÃ©ricaine de lâ€™aviation a notamment exigÃ© un meilleur contrÃ´le qualitÃ© dans la production du 737.
Production paralysÃ©e
La grÃ¨ve entraÃ®nera la fermeture de deux grandes usines dâ€™assemblage dâ€™avions dans la rÃ©gion de Puget Sound - les deux tiers des votes Ã©taient nÃ©cessaires pour lancer un arrÃªt de travail dÃ¨s lâ€™expiration jeudi Ã  minuit de la convention actuelle, vieille de 16 ans. Elle va paralyser la production du 737, du 777 et du 767 cargo, dont les livraisons cumulent dÃ©jÃ  les retards. Une situation dâ€™autant plus problÃ©matique que lâ€™avionneur encaisse la plus grosse partie du paiement (environ 60%) Ã  la remise des avions.
â€œOn nous a bradÃ©sâ€
â€œNos membres se sont exprimÃ©s haut et fort ce soirâ€, a affirmÃ© M. Holden, dont le syndicat qui reprÃ©sente environ 33.000 travailleurs dans le nord-ouest du Pacifique, avait initialement soutenu lâ€™accord. Le syndicaliste avait auparavant dÃ©clarÃ© ne pas pouvoir â€œgarantir que nous obtiendrons davantage en faisant grÃ¨veâ€. â€œOn nous a bradÃ©sâ€, a lancÃ© jeudi Ã  lâ€™AFP Kamie Bryan, employÃ©e chez Boeing depuis 18 ans, aprÃ¨s avoir votÃ© contre lâ€™accord et pour la grÃ¨ve. â€œNous ne devrions pas prendre ces quelques sous quâ€™ils nous donnent et Ãªtre reconnaissantsâ€, a-t-elle relevÃ©, insistant sur lâ€™ampleur des â€œrevenus du patronâ€.
La derniÃ¨re grÃ¨ve chez lâ€™avionneur amÃ©ricain remonte Ã  2008 et avait durÃ© 57 jours. Le groupe Boeing a dÃ©clarÃ© Ãªtre â€œengagÃ©â€ dans des nÃ©gociations en dÃ©pit du vote massif de ses salariÃ©s. â€œNous restons dÃ©terminÃ©s Ã  rÃ©tablir nos relations avec nos employÃ©s et le syndicat, et nous sommes prÃªts Ã  retourner Ã  la table des nÃ©gociations pour parvenir Ã  un nouvel accordâ€, a dÃ©clarÃ© lâ€™entreprise dans un communiquÃ© jeudi soir.

Ce dispositif impliquerait que la Commission de rÃ©gulation de lâ€™Ã©lectricitÃ© et du gaz (CREG) examine et approuve tous les nouveaux contrats. Un soutien apprÃ©ciÃ© des travailleurs bruxellois, â€œcâ€™est un signal importantâ€, juge le syndicaliste.

author: Armando de Oliveira Lima
title: ExportaÃ§Ã£o de rochas via PecÃ©m deve superar as 50 mil toneladas em 2024 | Economia | OPOVO+
text: O CearÃ¡ deve encerrar 2024 com 50 mil toneladas de [rochas](https://mais.opovo.com.br/jornal/economia/2021/06/29/o-salto-na-exportacao-de-rochas-no-ceara.html) exportadas via Porto do [PecÃ©m](https://www.opovo.com.br/tudo-sobre/pecem/). Atualmente, a marca Ã© de 40,192 mil toneladas registradas no dia 2 de outubro, quando o navio MV Jacamar Arrow partiu com 12,146 mil toneladas para o Porto de Livorno, na ItÃ¡lia. A projeÃ§Ã£o Ã© de Carlos Rubens AraÃºjo, presidente do Sindicato da IndÃºstria de MÃ¡rmores e Granitos do Estado do CearÃ¡ (Simagran-CE), e representa um crescimento de 14,29% sobre as 43,745 mil toneladas movimentadas no ano passado. Mas a expansÃ£o sobre a marca de 2023 nÃ£o supera a de [2022](https://mais.opovo.com.br/colunistas/armando-de-oliveira-lima/2022/11/09/pecem-sela-recorde-de-exportacao-de-rochas.html), quando o PecÃ©m movimentou 68,364 mil toneladas de rochas para o exterior. No entanto, observa o presidente do Simagran, isso Ã© uma questÃ£o de incentivo. Com estÃ­mulos, ele acredita que o setor pode saltar dos atuais 3,5% de participaÃ§Ã£o nas exportaÃ§Ãµes cearenses para mais de 7% e a explicaÃ§Ã£o estÃ¡ na atenÃ§Ã£o que o mercado internacional estÃ¡ dando ao CearÃ¡. â€œO CearÃ¡, hoje, Ã© a fronteira da pedra natural no mundo. As pedras que sÃ£o mais desejadas no mundo estÃ£o no CearÃ¡. A pedra que Ã© mais conhecida no mundo Ã© extraÃ­da aqui no Estado do CearÃ¡ e se chama Taj Mahal, como o monumento da Ãndiaâ€, ressalta. Carlos Rubens comenta que investidores de Estados Unidos, FranÃ§a, BÃ©lgica, China e inÃºmeros outros mercados estÃ£o de olho e importam os blocos desta pedra, que sÃ£o usados na construÃ§Ã£o civil. O material bruto, como o movimentado no PecÃ©m pela Tecer Terminais nos Ãºltimos trÃªs dias, vai prioritariamente para a ItÃ¡lia e para a China. Nesses destinos, os blocos sÃ£o beneficiados, ou seja, sÃ£o laminados e divididos para a aplicaÃ§Ã£o em pisos de hoteis, aeroportos e edifÃ­cios em geral por todo o mundo. A Taj Mahal, explica o presidente do Simagran, â€œtem 98,5% de cristal de quartzo, entÃ£o, Ã© uma rocha que resiste Ã  abrasÃ£o, nÃ£o arranha e possui tonalidade bege.â€ Um exemplo de aplicaÃ§Ã£o dela no prÃ³prio CearÃ¡ Ã© o piso do BS Design. â€œÃ‰ um prÃ©dio que tem 7 anos e parece que o piso foi colocado hoje. E daqui a 20 anos vai estar do mesmo jeito. Ã‰ uma rocha que tem uma caracterizaÃ§Ã£o tecnolÃ³gica fantÃ¡stica e alia isso com o aspecto decorativo. Ã‰ o sonho, o que sempre se desejou que estivesse numa rochaâ€, cita, mostrando o porquÃª do interesse dos investidores no produto. A pedra cobiÃ§ada por investidores internacionais e sÃ³ encontrada no CearÃ¡ tem em Uruoca e Santana do AcaraÃº a zona de maior produÃ§Ã£o, atualmente. O presidente do Simagran-CE aponta ainda que jÃ¡ foram descobertas jazidas de Taj Mahal em ViÃ§osa do CearÃ¡ e Granja tambÃ©m. Ele explica ainda que o nome Ã© uma generalizaÃ§Ã£o dada pelo mercado internacional. No CearÃ¡, cada empresa que explora o tipo de pedra, dÃ¡ uma marca a sua produÃ§Ã£o - como acontece com outros tipos de indÃºstrias. Na prÃ¡tica, acrescenta, â€œÃ© um grupo de rochas cuja terminologia mais comum Ã© o Taj Mahal, mas existe no mercado com vÃ¡rios outros nomes, como Matira e Avohay.â€ Para o transporte da Taj Mahal e das demais pedras exploradas no CearÃ¡, o Porto do PecÃ©m recebeu quatro navios em 2024. O quinto navio que deve selar a projeÃ§Ã£o feita pelo Siamgran-CE chega por volta do Natal, segundo informou Carlos Alberto Nunes, diretor comercial da Tecer. A Ãºltima operaÃ§Ã£o feita pela empresa movimentou 458 blocos entre os dias 29 de setembro e 2 de outubro no Terminal de MÃºltiplo Uso (Tmut) do PecÃ©m. Foi a segunda maior embarcaÃ§Ã£o do tipo a atracar no porto para transportar rochas cearenses. â€œÃ‰ um mercado muito promissor. NÃ³s operamos este tipo de carga hÃ¡ oito anos. Enviamos para Carrara (ItÃ¡lia), que Ã© o hub internacional de rochas, mas tambÃ©m para outros portos da ItÃ¡lia e China, alÃ©m dos Estados Unidosâ€, detalha Nunes. O diretor comercial conta que a operaÃ§Ã£o nÃ£o se dÃ¡ apenas com o navio especÃ­fico para blocos, mas como os blocos alocados em contÃªineres tambÃ©m. A operaÃ§Ã£o Ã© feita no PecÃ©m, mas passa por Santos, a partir de um transbordo de cargas rumo Ã  China. De 2018 atÃ© o fim deste ano, a Tecer projeta uma movimentaÃ§Ã£o de rochas de 10.050 blocos e um total de 276,087 mil toneladas movimentadas a partir do PecÃ©m. O que pode se tornar bem mais, segundo o presidente do Simagran-CE. Brasil No Brasil, 80% das exportaÃ§Ãµes de rochas passam pelo EspÃ­rito Santo. A atividade representa 13% do PIB estadual

author: danielle.campoamor@hearst.com (Danielle Campoamor)
title: Angelina Jolie's Brother Says He's "Protective" of Her and Her Kids as Her Divorce From Brad Pitt Continues to Unfold
text:
Angelina Jolie's big brother, James Haven, is opening up about what he feels his role is as a sibling and uncle and as his younger sister continues her divorce proceedings from estranged husband, Brad Pitt.
In a recent interview on the
90who10 podcast, Haven was asked about his "very close" relationship with his sister.
(If you recall, in 2000 Jolie famously kissed her brother on the lips after winning an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for her performance in Girl, Interrupted and people collectively lost their minds.)
In response, Haven said that he has been supportive of her sister and his six nieces and nephews as their personal life continues to unfold "in the public eye.â€
"Thatâ€™s where it all started," the proud big brother said. "It started with the protection of her and her childrenâ€”my nieces and nephews.â€
Haven went on to say that he has the ability to "set my life up so I can be present with whatever the situation."
â€œI want to be there for them or for her," he added. "Whatever sheâ€™s going through.â€
We stan a supportive sibling, always.
For the uninitiated, Jolie filed for divorce from Pitt in September, 2016. The actress accused her estranged husband of â€œ
physically and verballyâ€ assaulting her and their children during a flight on a private jet and just days before she ended the relationship, BuzzFeed reports.
Pitt was
cleared of any wrongdoing following the initial investigation, according to BuzzFeed, though his lawyer said in a statement in 2022 that he â€œhas owned everything heâ€™s responsible for from day one," Yahoo reports.
Jolie and Pitt share six childrenâ€”Maddox, 22; Pax, 20; Zahara, 18; Shiloh, 17; and twins Knox and Vivienne, 15.
â€œTheyâ€™re becoming young adults, early 20s,â€ Haven said in the same podcast interview. â€œI think itâ€™s just very natural and I just want to be there any time. Anytime Iâ€™m blessed to be in their presence, I want to be in their presence."
Danielle Campoamor is an award-winning freelance writer covering mental health, reproductive justice, abortion access, maternal mental health, politics, and feminist issues. She has been published in The New York Times, Washington Post, CNN, NBC, Vogue, Harper's Bazaar, Marie Claire, InStyle, Playboy, Teen Vogue, Glamour, The Daily Beast, and more.

author: Martha Elizabeth Moore
title: The Stetson Family Delivers A Rich Collection Of Songs With Their New Album - The Stars, If You Look Closely - African American News Today - EIN Presswire
text: Their Fourth Album Is Available Across All Platforms EINPresswire.com / -- Australiaâ€™s award-winning Americana/Bluegrassers, The Stetson Family, launch new album and new single ,amidst a week full of multiple track premieres and a music video premiere. The single, â€œDollar In My Hand,â€ is a gritty, ear-worm take on greed. The new album, THE STARS, IF YOU LOOK CLOSELY, is an accomplished 11-track outing, and will be available across all platforms Friday. The â€œDollar In My Handâ€ music video enjoyed a broadcast premiere on Bluegrass Ridge TV Series, and an online premiere on Americana UK. The moody black & white piece was filmed by the Yarra River at Bellbird Park in Melbourne, Australia and was produced and directed by the bandâ€™s lead vocalist Nadine Budge. â€œItâ€™s a classic Australian bush setting - at night - with lights shining on the band, trees and trails to give shadow and light,â€ Nadine observes. â€œItâ€™s a dynamic that offers a darkness with the intent to express the greed and desperation inherent in the content of the song.â€ Additional launch week track premieres include: â€œBetter Left Unsaidâ€ (Americana Highways); â€œMake Me Ashesâ€ (The Bluegrass Situation); â€œHeading Westâ€ (Bluegrass Today), and â€œMamaâ€™s Gonna Take You Homeâ€ (Roughstock). Ern Rose, the legendary producer and engineer behind iconic projects for The Little River Band, Renee Geyer, and Daddy Cool, recorded, mixed and co-produced the album with Budge. The project is being hailed as a â€œrich collection of beautifully crafted and performed songsâ€ by ABC Radio Melbourne Friday Revue, while Country Music People Magazine describes the outing as an â€œaccomplished set of songs with tight harmonies and great picking.â€ Known for creating a spirited and freewheeling sound, the Melbourne-based group was formed in 2008. The Stetson Family is comprised of Budge (lead vocals, guitar, resonator guitar), John Bartholomeusz (guitar, harmonies, lead guitar), Colin Swan (banjo, harmonies), Luke Richardson (double bass), and Greg Field (mandolin and fiddle). You can learn more about the band on their website, and stay social on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and Spotify. THE STARS, IF YOU LOOK CLOSELY Track Listing The Stars, If You Look Closely (A. Carswell, N. Budge) The Other Side (J. Bartholomeusz, N. Budge) Dollar In My Hand (J. Bartholomeusz) Lonesome Valley (J. Bartholomeusz) Nightfall (N. Budge) Better Left Unsaid (N. Budge) Heading West (J. Bartholomeusz, N. Budge) Brother (N. Budge) Angelâ€™s Hand (A. Carswell, N. Budge, The Stetson Family) Make Me Ashes (N. Budge) Mamaâ€™s Gonna Take You Home (J. Bartholomeusz) ABOUT THE STETSON FAMILY Budge, Bartholomeusz and Swan were previously members of the â€˜80s synth-pop band Schizo Scherzo. A chance meeting 15 years after the groupâ€™s dissolution found them bonding again, this time over the music of Oh Brother, Where Art Thou. Instruments came out, voices harmonized, Bartholomeuszâ€™s childhood friend Andy Carswell came into the picture and, soon after, original songs started flowing. They were then joined by Luke Richardson on double bass and, following Carswellâ€™s 2016 passing, Greg Field came on board with mandolin and fiddle. Together, they create an Americana/Bluegrass/Folk soundscape that resonates globally. Four albums down the track and the band still revels in playing to audiences around the country. Martha Elizabeth Moore so much MOORE media email us here Dollar In My Hand Culture, Society & Lifestyle , Music Industry EIN Presswire does not exercise editorial control over third-party content provided, uploaded, published, or distributed by users of EIN Presswire. Such content may contain the views, opinions, statements, offers, and other material of the respective users, suppliers, participants, or authors. Submit your press release

author: Ansa
title: Al via lo sciopero generale di Cgil e Uil, 'cambiare la manovra'
text: (ANSA) - ROMA, 29 NOV - Al via lo sciopero generale, proclamato da Cgil e Uil, per chiedere di cambiare la manovra di bilancio, aumentare salari e pensioni, finanziare sanitÃ , istruzione, servizi pubblici e investire nelle politiche industriali. Uno stop di 8 ore per tutti i settori privati e pubblici, ad eccezione dei trasporti dove Ã¨ di 4 ore: per bus e metro dalle 9 alle 13, cosÃ¬ come per il trasporto marittimo, per i voli dalle 10 alle 14. Esclusi dallo stop i treni. Una mobilitazione che si articolerÃ  in 43 piazze su tutto il territorio nazionale, indetta per contrastare "le scelte ingiuste e sbagliate del governo". I segretari generali, Maurizio Landini e Pierpaolo Bombardieri concluderanno rispettivamente le manifestazioni di Bologna (corteo ore 9.30, da Porta Lame a Piazza Maggiore) e Napoli (corteo ore 9.30, da Piazza Mancini a Piazza Matteotti). In contemporanea, in alcune cittÃ , i comizi saranno conclusi dai dirigenti sindacali delle segreterie nazionali di Cgil e Uil. (ANSA). .

author: @infobae
title: Estas son las playas de CancÃºn con mejor calidad del agua - Infobae
text:
Playas de CancÃºn estÃ¡n entre las mÃ¡s limpias de MÃ©xico Foto: Wikipedia/Luis Miguel Bugallo SÃ¡nchez CancÃºn , ubicado en la costa noreste de la penÃ­nsula de YucatÃ¡n en MÃ©xico, es uno de los destinos turÃ­sticos mÃ¡s populares del Caribe. Conocido por sus playas de arena blanca y aguas turquesas , este destino ofrece una gran variedad de resorts y hoteles de lujo, asÃ­ como opciones mÃ¡s econÃ³micas para todo tipo de viajeros.
La zona hotelera de CancÃºn estÃ¡ situada a lo largo de una franja estrecha de 22 kilÃ³metros entre el mar Caribe y la Laguna NichuptÃ©, con numerosos complejos turÃ­sticos que ofrecen todo incluido y actividades para todas las edades.
Sumado a ello, la ciudad costera es uno de los destinos turÃ­sticos mexicanos distinguidos por Blue Flag , un galardÃ³n internacional que otorga anualmente la FundaciÃ³n Europea para la EducaciÃ³n Ambiental (FEE) a las playas que cumplen con diversos requisitos, entre ellos calidad de agua .
Las playas de CancÃºn que cuentan con esta distinciÃ³n son Del NiÃ±o, Las Perlas, Chac Mool, MarlÃ­n, Ballenas, Delfines y Coral .
Turistas en la playa de CancÃºn, Quintana Roo (EFE/Alonso Cupul) De acuerdo con la ComisiÃ³n Nacional del Agua (Conagua), â€œla calidad de agua presente en las playas Blue Flag MÃ©xico estÃ¡ exenta de agentes que pongan en riesgo la salud humana y cumplen con el muestreo de la calidad y los requisitos de frecuencia establecidos por el programaâ€.
Sumado a ello, 36 embarcaciones de CancÃºn Sailing y cuatro hoteles (Iberostar, Fiesta Americana Condesa, Live Aqua y Flamingo) cuentan tambiÃ©n con una Blue Flag.
De acuerdo con el gobierno municipal de Benito JuÃ¡rez, con estos resultados CancÃºn obtiene primer lugar nacional en banderas azules y primer lugar internacional en embarcaciones sostenibles.
â€œCancÃºn estÃ¡ en un periodo de transformaciÃ³n y debemos visibilizar lo que podemos hacer para mejorar. Tenemos que generar menos basura y ser mÃ¡s conscientesâ€, declarÃ³ la presidenta muncipal, Ana Paty Peralta.
Cabe mencionar que en Quintana Roo hay otra playas Blue Flag, se trata de Balneario Municipal de Bacalar, Playa Centro y Playa 88.
Â¿QuÃ© son las â€œbanderas azulesâ€ y que otras playas las tienen? MÃ©xico ha logrado una destacada presencia en el programa Blue Flag , al contar con 35 playas y dos marinas certificadas, posicionÃ¡ndose como el paÃ­s con mÃ¡s distintivos en AmÃ©rica. Fuera de Quintana Roo, estas son las zonas que cuentan con banderas azules.
CancÃºn no es el Ãºnico sitio que cuenta con la distinciÃ³n "Blue Flag" (Cuartoscuro) - Baja California Sur: El Chileno, Acapulquito, El Corsario, Palmilla, Playa Hacienda, Santa MarÃ­a, Las Viudas, El Coromuel, Marina Cortez.
- Guerrero: El Revolcadero, El Revolcadero II, Icacos, Icacos II, El Palmar I, El Palmar II.
- Jalisco: Amapas, Camarones, Conchas Chinas I, Conchas Chinas II, Garza Blanca, Palmares, Playa de Oro, Sheraton.
- Nayarit: Nuevo Vallarta Norte, Marina Riviera Nayarit, Laguna Santa MarÃ­a del Oro.
- Oaxaca: ChahuÃ©.
Este reconocimiento internacional, gestionado por el organismo internacional FEE, con sede en Dinamarca , evalÃºa la calidad del agua, la seguridad, los servicios, la gestiÃ³n y la educaciÃ³n ambiental de playas y marinas.
El programa monitorea y evalÃºa estrictamente estos puntos, asegurando un continuo control de estÃ¡ndares. Actualmente, existen 4,423 sitios Blue Flag en 45 paÃ­ses . En MÃ©xico, los sitios certificados evidencian una constante supervisiÃ³n de la limpieza del agua y la implementaciÃ³n de programas de restauraciÃ³n y monitoreo de ecosistemas costeros.
La certificaciÃ³n no solo mejora la conservaciÃ³n ambiental, sino que tambiÃ©n contribuye al desarrollo sostenible del turismo en estas Ã¡reas.
Las playas y marinas Blue Flag en MÃ©xico son ejemplo de cÃ³mo la gestiÃ³n eficiente y la educaciÃ³n ambiental pueden coexistir con el desarrollo turÃ­stico.

author: no author
title: Dearborn police concerned after hospital patients released without essentials | FOX 2 Detroit
text:
Dearborn police concerned after hospital patients released without essentials
Police body-worn cameras captured a patient just discharged from Corewell Health Hospital in Dearborn. He didnâ€™t have shoes on and was hooked up to a colostomy bag, wandering a neighborhood near the hospital when Dearborn police responded.
